title: InfoWidget Configuration
description: Schema for configuring an info widget component with colored variants and content display

tplFile.description: Template file identifier for the info widget

title.description: Main title text to display in the info widget

attrs.description: Info widget attributes and styling options

content.description: Main content text displayed in the widget body

description.description: Optional description text displayed below the title

variant.description: Color variant that determines the background and border styling

enumDescriptions.default: White background with gray border (neutral styling)
enumDescriptions.info: Light blue background with blue border (informational content)
enumDescriptions.success: Light green background with green border (positive/success messages)
enumDescriptions.warning: Light yellow background with yellow border (warning/caution messages)
enumDescriptions.error: Light red background with red border (error/danger messages)

colSpan.description: Grid column span for layout positioning
